title: Special Preview - Up On Game w/ LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh & Plaxico Burress joined by Jerome Bettis!
itunes:title: Special Preview - Up On Game w/ LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh & Plaxico Burress joined by Jerome Bettis!
description:
It’s the debut of ‘Up on Game’ with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress! The guys explain the reason that Cam Newton hasn’t been a good fit in New England and T.J. shares the real story behind his infamous Terrible Towel incident. Plus, they speak with Hall of Fame running back Jerome Bettis about the 11-0 Pittsburgh Steelers.


Subscribe to Up On Game HERE >>> https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
